content.raw:
Is this correct solution:

1. Change to CamelCase with the following options: Release, Debug, RelWithDebInfo, Profile, Coverage

1. Assign the capitalized verison of the build type to a new variable, like GAZEBO_BUILD_TYPE

1. Use ${CMAKE_C_FLAGS_${GAZEBO_BUILD_TYPE}} to set the cflags accordingly. Note that there are other CMakeLists.txt that use this construct.
